verses.roman:
eka-dina āsi' prabhu duṅhāre mililā
sanātane ācambite kahite lāgilā

synonyms: eka-dina—one day; āsi'-coming; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; duṅhāre mililā—met both of them; sanātane—unto Sanātana Gosvāmī; ācambite—all of a sudden; kahite lāgilā—began to speak.
translation: One day when the Lord came to meet them, He suddenly began speaking to Sanātana Gosvāmī.
